answers.answer: Hello,From your symptoms granuloma annulare needs to be ruled out. Granuloma annulare is a chronic disease consisting of a rash with reddish bumps arranged in a circle or ring. Usually it is asymptomatic but due to cosmetic disfigurement topical or oral steroids may be needed. Please discuss this with your dermatologist.I hope it helps. Take care and please do keep me posted in case you have any additional doubts. Kind regards.

question: I need help how to cure this "ring worm look like". I got this problem after the boils symptom heal. 1 month ago got skin cut (bare foot) in the ocean ( beach) then the skin cut heal in 1 week, after that the Boils symptom appear. I went to Private Doctor (Clinic)  3 times visit (ring worn cream & antibiotic) 1 time visit i ask for injection, but this "ring worm" still coming back..please tell me the solution.. (i don't have diabetes)
title: Skin Infection Unknown
